FuncDef: The display cfm ma command displays details about a maintenance association (MA).

ParaDef.Info:
Displays details about MAs in a specified maintenance domain (MD). If md-name is not specified, details about all MAs in all MDs are displayed.
md-name specifies the name of an MD. The value is a string of 1 to 43 characters. Question marks (?) are not supported.

Displays details about a specified MA. If md-name is specified and ma-name is not specified, details about all MAs in the MD specified by md-name are displayed.
ma-name specifies the name of an MA. The value is a string of 1 to 43 characters. Question marks (?) are not supported.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display cfm ma md md1 ma ma1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After an MA is configured or connectivity fault management (CFM) fails, you can use the display cfm ma command to check the configurations of the MA and the number of maintenance association end points (MEPs) and remote maintenance association end points (RMEPs) in the MA.
